description: Let’s take a look at how the customer service experience is being transformed by the presence of artificial intelligence and conversational agents.

title: Best Artificial Intelligence Stocks To Follow Now – December 29th

title: AI Pioneer Hinton Warns of 2026 White-Collar Job Losses
description: Geoffrey Hinton, AI pioneer, warns that 2026 will usher in massive job losses as advanced AI replaces human roles in white-collar sectors like data analysis and decision-making. He urges policy interventions to mitigate economic inequality and unemployment. Physical jobs may endure longer, but preparation is essential.

title: Axis Max Life Leverages Agentic AI to Deliver Improved Customer Experience; Accelerates Customer Response TATs by 30%
description: New Delhi [India], December 29: Axis Max Life Insurance Limited ("Axis Max Life" / "Company"), formerly known as Max Life Insurance Company Limited, has significantly improved customer experience through the deployment of an AI-powered Core-Converse email bot that has helped reduce customer email query resolution time by 30%. This transformation ensures faster, more accurate responses, reinforcing Axis Max Life's commitment to delivering superior service and convenience to policyholders.
